en.today: The Taurus moon forms challenging aspects with Pluto and Mercury early this morning, sweet Aries. You may feel paranoid about what others are thinking or saying about you, though the fears you harbor are likely unsubstantiated. Luckily, Venus and Jupiter join forces to usher in sweetness, urging you to confide in someone who cares. The amount of love and nurturing you receive will far outweigh any negative vibes you sense on the periphery. Gauge potential outcomes before executing bold moves while Luna opposes Mars later today, taking care to solidify your footing before leaping toward new horizons.
